description: T.1 Horse Chestnut - Fell.G2. Group of 3 Horse Chestnut x 3 - Crown Reduction. Reducing the height and spread of the trees by up to 3 metres. Height pre works 20m post works 17m. Crown spread of group pre works 15m post 12m
